body:
# Components

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :sparkles: Implementation of http client request analysis for OkHttp3 (#9654 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Opt-out API Security endpoint discovery (#9623 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Guard parsed-body instrumentation from raw Spring HttpMessageConverters (#9613 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Add downstream HTTP request/response analysis for OkHttp2 client (#9572 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Update Extended appsec request/response headers and request body collection (#9428 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Add new features for trace tagging rules (#9131 - @sezen-datadog)

## Configuration at Runtime

* :sparkles: Add support for org level APM_TRACING configs (#9360 - @shatzi)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :bug: Fix fallback ExecutionRequest creator in JUnit 5 instrumentation (#9673 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Add support for JUnit 5.14 (#9664 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Minor fixes for code coverage report upload (#9659 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Add session level metrics for Failed Test Replay (#9531 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :bug: Set correct subdomain when sending intake requests via EVP proxy (#9517 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Add support for JUnit 6 (#9509 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :bug: Fix test status propagation in headless mode (#9478 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :bug: Fix JUnit 5 Cucumber instrumentation for version 7.28.1 (#9474 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles: Implement Failed Test Replay (#9214 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Crash tracking

* :bug: Properly handle user provided crash/oome script paths (#9496 - @jbachorik)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :sparkles: Fix Exception Probes to not emit any probe status (#9669 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Stream the SymDB serialization and compression (#9642 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add CompletableFuture in WellKnownClasses (#9622 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix symbol extraction for interface static method (#9597 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Allow pre-Java 6 classes to be transformed in the debugger (#9591 - @deejgregor  - thanks for the contribution!)
* :bug: Disable exit spans (#9581 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Prevent using v1/input endpoint for snapshots (#9573 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix error logged for Bridge methods (#9504 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Send only snapshots to Debugger Track (#9501 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add support debugger/v2/input endpoint (#9406 - @shatzi)

## GraalVM native-image

* :bug: Disable process context sharing when using native image (#9647 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Library Injection

* :sparkles: Add `ikeycmd` and `ikeyman` utilities from `IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition` to exclusion list. (#9482 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)
* :sparkles: Add `UtilityMain` from Open Liberty to SSI exclusion list. (#9460 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)

## ML Observability (LLMObs)

* :bug: Fix LLM Observability Data Submission (#9476 - @sabrenner)
* :sparkles: Default LLM Observability ML Application to Service Name (#9415 - @sabrenner)

## Metrics

* :sparkles::zap: Defer metrics aggregator classloading to save startup time (#9590 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Lazily obtain feature discovery when starting client metrics (#9548 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Exclude long running partial versions from stats (#9495 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Avoid direct casting of base service tag to string (#9489 - @amarziali)
* :bulb::test_tube: Activate client stats by default for java 17 services (#9463 - @amarziali)

## Platform components

* :sparkles: Improve OS type and architecture detection (#9637 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Profiling

* :sparkles: Bump ddprof to 1.32.0 (#9584 - @zhengyu123) ([Changelog](https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/compare/v_1.31.0...v_1.32.0))
  * Update process context support with version 0.0.7 of reference library by @ivoanjo in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/268
  * Implement 64-bit trace ID system with double-buffered storage and liveness tracking by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/262
  * Thread filter optim by @r1viollet in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/238
  * Bypass JDK-8313796 workaround for the fixed JDK versions by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/273
  * Relax memory constraint on independent counters by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/275
* :sparkles: Use the built-in CPU profiler on JDK 25 and Linux (#9502 - @jbachorik)

## Realtime User Monitoring

* :bug: Refactor RUM telemetry (#9526 - @sarahchen6)

## Telemetry

* :bug: Error Logs Remediation 2 (#9467 - @ygree)
* :sparkles: ConfigProvider iterates over all sources and reports all non-null values to telemetry (#9404 - @mtoffl01)

## Testing

* :sparkles: Fix gradle update pipeline (#9580 - @cbeauchesne)
* :bug: Fixed git command hangs in case if no remote exists. (#9575 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)
* :broom: Ensure tracer and scheduler are clean after test execution (#9512 - @amarziali)

## Tracer core

* :sparkles::zap: Send process tags once per payload (#9657 - @amarziali)
* :broom: Remove tracing requirement to be enabled to generate a flare (#9579 - @cecile75)
* :sparkles: Replace FixedSizeStripedLongAdder with LongAdder (#9571 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Disable byte-buddy's Nexus mechanism (#9569 - @mcculls)
* :bug: Ensure health metrics are closed when the tracer is closed (#9511 - @amarziali)
* :bulb: Enable process tags collection by default (#9510 - @raphaelgavache)
* :bug: Ensure info discovery state change is atomic (#9497 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Fixing oversight of missing synchronized on long version of recalibrate (#9480 - @dougqh)
* :broom: Improving TagMap coverage (#9470 - @dougqh)
* :bug: Fix NPE for keys with empty value in Stable Configuration (#9461 - @BaptisteFoy)
* :bug: Update datadog.trace.agent.tooling.bytebuddy.outline.TypeOutline to work with ByteBuddy 1.17.6 (#9457 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :sparkles::zap: Add UTF8 caching for v0.4 (#9434 - @dougqh)

## Tracer public API

* :sparkles::test_tube: Initial implementation of the AI Guard SDK (#9628 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Migrate tests and `ConfigInversionMetricCollector` to `config-utils` module (#9566 - @mhlidd)

# Instrumentations

## Apache Spark instrumentation

* :sparkles: Extract Spark Plan "simpleString" into traces (#9645 - @charlesmyu)

## Core Java language instrumentation

* :sparkles: Add support for Java 25 Structured Concurrency API  (#9276 - @PerfectSlayer)

## JDBC instrumentation

* :sparkles: Add a span when waiting for an available database connection from a pool (#9251 #9636 - @deejgregor  - thanks for the contribution!)

## Kotlin instrumentation

* :bug: Improve thread-safety of `ScopeContext.restore` when swapping Kotlin coroutine contexts (#9491 - @mcculls)

## All other instrumentations

* :sparkles: Implementation of http client request analysis for OkHttp3 (#9654 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :sparkles: Add downstream HTTP request/response analysis for OkHttp2 client (#9572 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)
* :bulb: Resilience4j 2+ (#9525 - @ygree)
* :bug: Fix ClassCastException in SynapseServerInstrumentation (#9513 - @mcculls)
* :broom: Refactor Severless Gateway Inferred Span (#9388 - @PerfectSlayer)
